subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Kentucky, Syracuse, North Carolina and Michigan State each received a No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament, but a surprising number of low-wattage teams also made the cut.
snippet: Kentucky, Syracuse, North Carolina and Michigan State each received a No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball tournament, but a surprising number of low-wattage teams also made the cut.
